overview: Jackie, road manager of the dancers know as "The Dreams", takes his entourage to the small town of Key City. The guys are booked at the wild North Point Saloon, owned by the luscious Maxie Roget and the action begins. As always, before showtime the mood becomes restless and tense, so Maxie coaxes Jackie into getting a "quick bite" to calm him down. Meanwhile, dancers Jonathan, Joey and Sebastian offset their eagerness by meeting and seducing beautiful women.
tagline: An Exotic Explosion of Stars in... THE DANCERS
title: The Dancers
